content.rendered: Thenell Law Group is a law firm with offices in Portland and Bend, Oregon, as well as Seattle, Washington.  The firm’s practice areas include both first & third-party SIU, bad-faith litigation, insurance coverage disputes, construction litigation, products liability, personal injury defense, and general liability. The firm also handles criminal, civil, administrative and labor matters for police officers in Oregon and Washington.
